revision.text:
'''ViZDoom''' is a source port based on [[ZDoom]] v2.8.1 aimed at the creation of bots capable of playing the game using only visual feedback (by accessing and analyzing the screen buffer) and some limited scripting to allow "rewarding" certain actions such as picking up items or attacking monsters. Bots can be programmed in C++, Java, or Python.
==External links== * [http://vizdoom.cs.put.edu.pl/#scenarios Homepage] * [https://github.com/Marqt/ViZDoom/ GitHub repository]
[[Category:Source ports]]
